And I will always love you. – Whitney Houston, *I Will Always Love You*
Cause baby, you're a firework. – Katy Perry, *Firework*
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? – Queen, *Bohemian Rhapsody*
I will survive, oh, as long as I know how to love, I know I'll stay alive. – Gloria Gaynor, *I Will Survive*
Don’t stop believin’, hold on to that feeling. – Journey, *Don’t Stop Believin’*
Take me to church, I’ll worship like a dog at the shrine of your lies. – Hozier, *Take Me to Church*
We found love in a hopeless place. – Rihanna, *We Found Love*
I’m in love with the shape of you. – Ed Sheeran, *Shape of You*
It's a beautiful day, don't let it get away. – U2, *Beautiful Day*
I’m walking on sunshine, whoa-oh. – Katrina and the Waves, *Walking on Sunshine*
I want to hold your hand. – The Beatles, *I Want to Hold Your Hand*
You can’t always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you get what you need. – The Rolling Stones, *You Can't Always Get What You Want*
I’m not afraid to take a stand, everybody come take my hand. – Eminem, *Not Afraid*
I’m the one who wants to be with you. – Wilson Phillips, *Hold On*
No, I can't forget this evening, or your face as you were leaving. – Billy Joel, *Just the Way You Are*
I just wanna dance the night away. – The Mavericks, *Dance the Night Away*
And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make. – The Beatles, *The End*
It's my life, it's now or never. – Bon Jovi, *It's My Life*
I’ll be there for you, when the rain starts to pour. – The Rembrandts, *I'll Be There for You*
Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me. – Smash Mouth, *All Star*
